unnormalised: Entertainment News Flash: Is Your Data Bill Higher Than Mount Everest? Blame Music Streaming!
normalised: Entertainment News Flash: Is Your Data Bill Higher Than Mount Everest? Blame Music Streaming!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Are you constantly getting those "Data almost exhausted" notifications faster than you can say "Chai?" Well, a new study from IIT-Bombay suggests the culprit might be your insatiable appetite for Bollywood beats on those pesky music streaming apps.
normalised: Mumbai: Are you constantly getting those "Data almost exhausted" notifications faster than you can say "Chai?" Well, a new study from I I T hyphen Bombay suggests the culprit might be your insatiable appetite for Bollywood beats on those pesky music streaming apps.

unnormalised: Researchers discovered that streaming 'Sholay's' soundtrack for just 3 hours consumes approximately 1.2 GB of data. That's like downloading Gabbar Singh himself...in digital form!
normalised: Researchers discovered that streaming 'Sholay's' soundtrack for just three hours consumes approximately one point two gigabyte of data. That's like downloading Gabbar Singh himself...in digital form!

unnormalised: "People think it's all sunshine and lollipops, downloading a quick bhajan," says Dr. Sharma, the lead researcher. "But these apps are data-guzzling monsters, especially if you're streaming in HD to truly appreciate A.R. Rahman's genius."
normalised: "People think it's all sunshine and lollipops, downloading a quick bhajan," says Doctor Sharma, the lead researcher. "But these apps are data-guzzling monsters, especially if you're streaming in H D to truly appreciate A.R. Rahman's genius."

unnormalised: Experts warn that the average listener in Delhi, humming along to Honey Singh all day, could be burning through Rs. 500 worth of data weekly.
normalised: Experts warn that the average listener in Delhi, humming along to Honey Singh all day, could be burning through rupee five hundred worth of data weekly.

unnormalised: So, think twice before you stream that remix of "Choli Ke Peeche." Your wallet (and your sanity) will thank you. Remember, every byte counts, folks! Maybe dust off that old CD player? Just a thought.
normalised: So, think twice before you stream that remix of "Choli Ke Peeche." Your wallet (and your sanity) will thank you. Remember, every byte counts, folks! Maybe dust off that old C D player? Just a thought.

unnormalised: And for those extreme cases, you may want to contact TRAI for assistance.
normalised: And for those extreme cases, you may want to contact T R A I for assistance.
